DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate knee function , sport participation knee reinjuries 2 year group patient choose either nonsurgical surgical treatment anterior cruciate ligament ( ACL ) injury
DOC.detailed_description: This study part study overall study title 'Dynamic stability ACL-injured knee ' . The overall study prospectively follow cohort newly injure patient total rupture anterior cruciate ligament knee .
DOC.criteria: Anterior cruciate ligament rupture within 3 month injury Preinjury participation level I II sport least twice week Current previous injury contralateral leg Another grade III ligament injury , fracture , fullthickness articular cartilage damage
